record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, APRIL 16, 2007, AT 2 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to be brought before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:24 p.m., adjourned until Monday, April 16, 2007, at 2 p.m.
